user_management.title: Users & Groups Management
user_management.manage_description: Manage users, roles, and group assignments
user_management.no_users_matching_filters: No users match the current filters
user_management.readonly_description: This is a read-only view for analytics and oversight. To manage users, navigate to the specific dealership.
user_management.readonly_alert: This view is read-only for system analytics.
user_management.readonly_alert_cta: To manage users, click 'View Dealer' on any user with an assigned dealership.
user_management.manage_custom_roles_desc: Manage custom role assignments for this user. Users can have multiple roles.
user_management.user_must_reload_desc: {{name}} must reload their browser (Ctrl+Shift+R) to see the new permissions.
